You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to Built a census dashboard in Power BI to track employee metrics across the portfolio for a PE firm, 
including:
1)
Standardizing the census data across portfolio companies leveraging the automated workflows in Alteryx as different PortCos 
had different nomenclatures for various metrics.
2) Defining the use cases in collaboration with the client and finalized the required KPIs focused on attrition, growth, diversity, etc.
3) Building an interactive dashboard in Power BI to provide visibility into key performance metrics such as headcount growth, 
diversity and retention metrics with role-based access to PE firm management and portfolio companies.
4) Developing and implementing a custom logic to anonymize the company’s data dynamically for the view of each portfolio 
company.
